Class RegularVM

java.lang.Object
RegularVM
public class RegularVM extends Object
This class is in charge of handling the functions related to the Regular Vending Machine.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Item[]
    itemChoices
    array of items to choose from for the contents of the vending machine
    protected Slot[]
    slots
    slots that store the items in the vending machine

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegularVM()
    This constructor sets the default slotLimit to 12, and initializes the slots array to the size slotLimit.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    CashRegister
    accessCashRegister()
    This method gives access to the cash register.
    void
    dispenseItem(int index)
    This method is in charge of the buying process, it dispenses the item and calls the methods involved to decrease the stocks of the item.

    This method empties the slots array.

    This method returns the item choices for the vending machine.

  • Field Details

    • slots

      protected Slot[] slots
      slots that store the items in the vending machine

    • itemChoices

      protected Item[] itemChoices
      array of items to choose from for the contents of the vending machine

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVM

      public RegularVM()
      This constructor sets the default slotLimit to 12, and initializes the slots array to the size slotLimit. It also initializes the cash register that will be used.

  • Method Details

    • setItemChoices

      public void setItemChoices()
      This method initializes each item that the user can choose from when stocking the vending machine.

    • dispenseItem

      public void dispenseItem(int index)
      This method is in charge of the buying process, it dispenses the item and calls the methods involved to decrease the stocks of the item.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item in the vending machine

    • getSlots

      public Slot[] getSlots()
      This method returns the slots array of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      the slots array of the vending machine

    • setSlotIndex

      public void setSlotIndex(int slotIndex)
      This method sets the index of the slot to be accessed.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - index of the slot to be accessed

    • setSlot

      public int setSlot(Item item, int numOfItems)
      This method assigns an item to a slot. It also checks if the item to be added is already a duplicate. If the slot index reaches the end, it rechecks all the slots if there is an empty one.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be kept in the slot
      numOfItems - number of stocks kept in the slot
      Returns:
      1 if the addition of the item to the slot was successful, 0 otherwise

    • setCapacityPerSlot

      public int setCapacityPerSlot(int capacity)
      This method sets the capacity of each slot.
      Parameters:
      capacity - maximum number of stocks per slot
      Returns:
      1 if the capacity is valid, 0 otherwise

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(int index, int addAmt)
      This method handles the restocking of the item given in the parameter. The total sales is reset to 0 after restocking.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item to be restocked
      addAmt - amount of stocks to be added

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      This method checks if the slots array is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the array is empty, false otherwise

    • emptySlots

      public void emptySlots()
      This method empties the slots array.

    • accessCashRegister

      public CashRegister accessCashRegister()
      This method gives access to the cash register.
      Returns:
      the instance of cash register

    • getItemChoices

      public Item[] getItemChoices()
      This method returns the item choices for the vending machine.
      Returns:
      item choices array
